    # File app/controllers/cms/users_controller.rb, line 53
53:   def disable
54:     begin
55:       user.disable!
56:       flash[:notice] = "User #{user.login} disabled"
57:     rescue Exception => e
58:       flash[:error] = e.message
59:     end
60:     redirect_to cms_users_path
61:   end

index()

[Source]

    # File app/controllers/cms/users_controller.rb, line 11
11:   def index
12:     query, conditions = [], []
13:     
14:     unless params[:show_expired]
15:       query << "expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at >= ?"
16:       conditions << Time.now.utc
17:     end
18: 
19:     unless params[:key_word].blank?
20:       query << %w(login email first_name last_name).collect { |f| "lower(#{f}) LIKE lower(?)" }.join(" OR ")
21:       4.times { conditions << "%#{params[:key_word]}%" }
22:     end
23:     
24:     unless params[:group_id].to_i == 0
25:       query << "user_group_memberships.group_id = ?"
26:       conditions << params[:group_id]
27:     end
28:     
29:     query.collect! { |q| "(#{q})"}
30:     conditions = conditions.unshift(query.join(" AND "))
31:     per_page = params[:per_page] || 10
32:     
33:     @users = User.paginate(:page => params[:page], :per_page => per_page, :include => :user_group_memberships, :conditions => conditions, :order => "first_name, last_name, email")
34:   end

update_password()

[Source]

    # File app/controllers/cms/users_controller.rb, line 44
44:   def update_password
45:     if user.update_attributes(params[:user])
46:       flash[:notice] = "Password for '#{user.login}' was changed"
47:       redirect_to cms_users_path
48:     else
49:       render :action => 'change_password'
50:     end
51:   end

update_flash()

[Source]

    # File app/controllers/cms/users_controller.rb, line 77
77:     def update_flash
78:       if params[:on_fail_action] == "change_password"
79:         flash[:notice] = "Password for '#{@object.login}' changed"
80:       elsif params[:action] == "create"
81:         flash[:notice] = "User '#{@object.login}' was created"
82:       else
83:         flash[:notice] = "User '#{@object.login}' was updated"
84:       end
85:     end
